title: aTTa balukudu
sahitya:
aTTa balukudu viTTa balukudu vandukEmi sEtu rAma? nI  
(aTTa)

anupallavi

TOTla narbhakula nUtuvu; mari mari tOcinaTTu gilluuvu; shrI
rAma! nI  
(aTTa)

caraNam

jIvula shikshincaga nErtuvu, ciran-jIvulugA jEya nErtuvurA;
bhAvamerigi brOtuvu, sadbhakta-bhAgadhEya! shrI
tyAgarAjavinuta  
(aTTa)
